name: Currency Normalization
description: Normalise monetary values into a base currency

name: GeoIP
description: Enrich PostHog events and persons with IP location data.

name: Hello World
description: Greet the world with every PostHog event. An example plugin.

name: GitHub Release Tracker
description: Integrate PostHog with GitHub and get automatic release annotations.

name: GitLab Release Tracker
description: Integrate PostHog with GitLab and get automatic release annotations.

name: Bitbucket Release Tracker
description: Integrate PostHog with Bitbucket and get automatic release annotations.

name: Twitter Followers
description: Get your Twitter follower numbers daily without signing up to the Twitter API.

name: Hubspot
description: Send emails and user data to Hubspot when you identify users using PostHog.

name: Replicator
description: Replicate PostHog event stream in another PostHog instance.

name: Schema Enforcer
description: Prevent ingestion of events that don't match your specified schemas.

name: Customer.io
description: Send event data and available emails to Customer.io.

name: Sendgrid
description: Send emails and user data to Sendgrid when you identify users using PostHog.

name: Email Scoring
description: Add email scores to PostHog user profiles using the Mailboxlayer API.

name: BigQuery Export
description: Sends events to a Google BigQuery database on ingestion.

name: Pub/Sub Export
description: Sends events to a Google Pub/Sub topic on ingestion.

name: S3 Export
description: Sends events to a S3 bucket on ingestion.

name: Snowflake Export
description: Sends events to Snowflake on ingestion.

name: Useragent Enhancer
description: Enhances events with browser details when the event has a "$useragent" property.

name: Timestamp Parser
description: Parse your event timestamps into useful date properties.

name: Taxonomy Standardizer
description: Standardize your event names into a single pattern.

name: Property Flattener
description: Flatten event properties to easily access them in filters.

name: Event Sequence Timer Plugin
description: Measure the time taken for a user to perform Event B after performing Event A.

name: First Time Event Tracker
description: Track if a given event is the first event of this type for a user or the first event of its type ever.

name: Salesforce
description: Send events to a salesforce endpoint

name: Redshift Export
description: Sends events to Redshift on ingestion.

name: Downsampling
description: Reduces the number of events going into PostHog.

name: PostgreSQL Export
description: Export PostHog events to a PostgreSQL instance on ingestion.

name: Pagerduty (BETA)
description: This plugin alerts PagerDuty when a PostHog insights/trends graph goes below or above a threshold.

name: GCS Export
description: Export events to a Google Cloud Storage bucket.

name: Automatic Cohort Creator
description: Automatic cohort creation based on user properties.

name: RudderStack Export
description: Export events from PostHog to Rudderstack, using PostHog as a RudderStack source.

name: Orbit Stats Sync
description: Regularly sync statistics from Orbit.love directly into PostHog.

name: Redshift Import Plugin (BETA)
description: Import data from Redshift into PostHog. (This plugin is in BETA, use at your own risk!)

name: Github Star Sync
description: Synchronise Github stars with PostHog, with each star as a separate event.

name: Migrator 3000 (Beta)
description: BETA - Migrate events to a new PostHog instance. Currently available for self-hosted users only.

name: Ingestion Alert
description: This plugin triggers a webhook when no events have been ingested for a specified period of time. It can be used to alert you when ingestion for your project / instance is not working correctly..

name: Heartbeat
description: This is a very simple plugin which sends one event to your project per minute. It can be used to ensure a continuous flow of events when monitoring whether ingestion is up and running. Works great in conjunction with Posthog Ingestion Alert Plugin

name: Property Filter
description: This plugin will set all configured properties to null inside an ingested event.

name: Zendesk
description: Import new and historic ticket events to PostHog, update persons in Zendesk with context about recent events from your product

name: Netdata event processing (ALPHA)
description: Process events for Netdata

name: Avo Inspector Plugin
description: Send PostHog events to the Avo Inspector

name: Drop Events Based On Property
description: Drop events based on whether a property exist and optionally whether that property has a specific value.

name: Twilio
description: Send SMS messages via twilio based on events occuring in PostHog

name: Intercom
description: Send usage data to intercom for contacts

name: DataBricks
description: Export your PostHog data to databricks warehouse

name: AWS Kinesis
description: Sends event data to Posthog from a Kinesis Stream

name: Unduplicates
description: Prevent duplicates in your data.

name: Advanced GeoIP
description: Advanced GeoIP filtering app for PostHog.

name: Variance
description: Export customer data into Variance.

name: Shopify Connector
description: Sync customer and order data from Shopify, into PostHog..

name: Engage.so Connector
description: Send events tracked through PostHog to Engage.

name: URL normalizer
description: Normalize the format of urls in your application allowing you to more easily compare them in insights.

name: Patterns.app Connector
description: Send events tracked through PostHog to Patterns

name: SemVer Flattener
description: Flattens a SemVer version into useful standalone properties.

name: Filter Out
description: Injest only those events satisfying the given filter conditions

name: Pineapple Mode
description: Make any website better by adding falling pineapples or other types of rain.

name: Notification Bar
description: Show a notification bar on top of your site.

name: Feedback Widget
description: Collect feedback from your users with a small homepage widget.

name: User Interview App
description: Invite your users to an interview through an in-app pop-up with this app.

name: Laudspeaker
description: Send event data to Laudspeaker

name: Drop Events based on Property
description: This plugin will drop all events if it contains the property key, and optionally whether that property has a specific value

name: Language URL splitter
description: Remove `/en` in `/en/bla`, and store it as an event property.

name: Pace
description: Forward events directly to Pace

name: Stonly Clean Campaign Name
description: Clean campaign name for Stonly

name: Stonly Extract UTM
description: Extract UTM parameters for Stonly

name: Outfunnel Export
description: Export events to Outfunnel

name: URL parameters to event properties
description: Convert URL query parameters to event properties

name: Memphis Export
description: Publish PostHog events to memphis station

name: Route Censor
description: Censor variables from URLs that are passed to PostHog

name: NPS Score Collector
description: Collect NPS score ratings from your users

name: Early Access Features App
description: Give your users the ability to directly enable or disable features you want to beta test
